typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as short,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HospitalAdmissionSource
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountryLookupSource
source(output(
		date_key as string,
		date as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		day as string,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as string,
		week_of_month as string,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as string,
		year_week as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DateDimentionSource
HospitalAdmissionSource, CountryLookupSource lookup(HospitalAdmissionSource@country == CountryLookupSource@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		country = HospitalAdmissionSource@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		continent,
		indicator,
		Reported_Date = date,
		Reported_year_week = year_week,
		value,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequriedFileds
SelectRequriedFileds split(like(indicator, 'Weekly%'),
	disjoint: false) ~> DailyWeeklySplit@(Weekly, Daily)
DateDimentionSource aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week = year+'-W'+lpad(week_of_year,2,'0')),
	week_start_date = min(date),
		Week_end_date = max(date)) ~> MaxDateYearOftheWeek
DailyWeeklySplit@Weekly, MaxDateYearOftheWeek join(Reported_year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> WeekDatesJoin
SelectRequiredFileds1 pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		continent,
		Reported_year_week,
		week_start_date,
		Week_end_date,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator),
	Total = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> WeeklyPivote
WeekDatesJoin select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		continent,
		indicator,
		Reported_year_week,
		value,
		source,
		week_start_date,
		Week_end_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredFileds1
DailyWeeklySplit@Daily pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		continent,
		Reported_Date,
		source,
		Reported_year_week),
	pivotBy(indicator),
	Total = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> DailyPivot
WeeklyPivote sort(desc(Reported_year_week, true),
	asc(country, true)) ~> WeeklySort
DailyPivot sort(desc(Reported_year_week, true),
	asc(country, true)) ~> DailySort
WeeklySort sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Weekly_hospital_admissions.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WeeklySink
DailySort sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Daily_hospital_admissions.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DailySink
